name: Stunt Car Extreme
description:
Stunt Car Extreme is the ultimate stunt and trial car game with both entertaining and awe-inspiring tracks.
The main tracks are designed for casual play, but the bonus tracks offer more extreme challenge! The bonus tracks have high risks but also high rewards. Levels include hard trials levels, easier speed levels, and casual and fun jump levels.
Cars are customisable based on your preferences, with cool paint jobs, engines, tires and more.
